templates.name: Loan Sent to Processing
templates.subject: Loan Update: Your File is Now in Processing
templates.body_html:
Loan Update:

Sent to Processing

Dear {{contact.first_name}},

Great news! Your loan file has been submitted to our processing team. This is an important milestone in your mortgage journey.

What happens next:

  • Your processor will review all documents
  • They may reach out if any additional items are needed
  • Once complete, your file moves to underwriting

I'll keep you updated as your loan progresses. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out!

Dear {{contact.first_name}} and {{contact.last_name}},

What happens next:

templates.name: Final Docs Ready
templates.subject: Loan Update: Final Documents Ready!
templates.body_html:
Loan Update:

Final Documents Ready

Dear {{contact.first_name}} and {{contact.last_name}},

Just wanted to let you know that we have completed your final loan documents and they are now ready to go to the title company!

I will be in contact with you shortly to discuss the next steps.

Important - Wire Transfer:

You should plan on making arrangements to wire funds to the title company to close your loan. IMPORTANT: Always verify wire instructions by phone before sending any funds. Wire fraud is real!

templates.name: Conditional Approval
templates.subject: Loan Update: Conditionally Approved!
templates.body_html:
Loan Update:

Conditional Approval

Dear {{contact.first_name}} and {{contact.last_name}},

Great news! Your loan has received Conditional Approval from underwriting!

This means the underwriter has reviewed your file and approved it pending a few remaining items. I'll be in touch to discuss what's needed to satisfy these conditions.

What this means:

  • Your loan is approved subject to conditions
  • We need to provide a few more documents or verifications
  • Once conditions are cleared, you'll receive full approval
Progress
